      • ExcelParseUtils

        public ExcelParseUtils(java.lang.String filepath,
               java.lang.String fileName)
        class construct with initlize to set filename for excel file operations.
        参数:
        fileName - the excel file name with whole path

      • ExcelParseUtils

        public ExcelParseUtils(java.lang.String subFolder)
        class construct with initlize to set filename for excel file operations.
        参数:
        subFolder - the excel file path under public file path, named testdata.xls

    • 方法详细资料

      • setExcelValue

        public void setExcelValue(java.lang.String sheetName,
                 int row,
                 int col,
                 java.lang.String value)
        write excel sheet, specified value to specified cell.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        row - row index which to be changed
        col - column index which to be changed
        value - value to be put into cell
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • putListToExcelWithFullIgnore

        public void putListToExcelWithFullIgnore(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> dataList,
                                int rowNum,
                                int ignoreRows,
                                int ignoreColumns)
        put dataList to excel sheets.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name.
        dataList - data list to be parsed and put into excel sheets.
        rowNum - row count of the sheet to be modified.
        ignoreRows - rows to skip when put value.
        ignoreColumns - columns to skip when put value.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • putListToExcelWithNoColumnIgnore

        public void putListToExcelWithNoColumnIgnore(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> dataList,
                                    int rowNum,
                                    int ignoreRows)
        put dataList to excel sheets.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name.
        dataList - data list to be parsed and put into excel sheets.
        rowNum - row count of the sheet to be modified.
        ignoreRows - rows to skip when put value.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

                             int row,
                             int col)
        get excel cell value of specified cell.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        row - row index which to be changed
        col - column index which to be changed
        返回:
        excel cell value string
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • excelToList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> excelToList(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                           int ignoreRows,
                                           int ignoreCols,
                                           int readRows,
                                           int readColumns)
        get the specified excel sheet and put its value string to list.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        ignoreRows - first several rows not to read.
        ignoreCols - first several cols not to read.
        readRows - specified row count to read.
        readColumns - specified column count to read.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • excelToListHasNoIgnore

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> excelToListHasNoIgnore(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                                      int readRows,
                                                      int readColumns)
        get the specified excel sheet and put its value string to list, with no ignores.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        readRows - specified row count to read.
        readColumns - specified column count to read.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • excelToListWithAllArea

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> excelToListWithAllArea(java.lang.String sheetName)
        get the specified excel sheet and put its value string to list.
        with no ignores rows and columns, read all the sheet area.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • excelToListAllAreaAfterIgnore

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> excelToListAllAreaAfterIgnore(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                                             int ignoreRows,
                                                             int ignoreCols)
        get the specified excel sheet and put its value string to list.
        ignores several rows and columns, then read all the rest sheet area.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        ignoreRows - first several rows not to read.
        ignoreCols - first several cols not to read.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • excelToListAllAreaAfterIgnore

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> excelToListAllAreaAfterIgnore(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                                             int ignoreRows)
        get the specified excel sheet and put its value string to list.
        ignores several rows and no columns, then read all the rest sheet area.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        ignoreRows - first several rows not to read.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
